channel.title: reflection on ps126.5

item.title: sleep
item.description: NKRV ps 127:2. 너희가 일찍이 일어나고 늦게 누우며 수고의 떡을 먹음이 헛되도다 그러므로 여호와께서 그의 사랑하시는 자에게는 잠을 주시는도다 KJV ps 127:2. It is vain for you to rise up early, to sit up late, to eat the bread of sorrows: for so he giveth his beloved sleep. CJB ps 127:2. In vain do you get up early and put off going to bed, working hard to earn a living; for he provides for his beloved, even when they sleep.

item.title: Start
item.description: They that sow in tears shall reap in joy. ps 126:5 start
